New Records: Norman Powell recorded his first career double-double with 31 points and 12 rebounds
Key Match Events: The Clippers held a 16-5 run in the fourth quarter to extend their lead
Powell and Amir Coffey made consecutive three-pointers to push the lead back to double digits
Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers were aiming to stay above.500 for the first time this season after a 2-4 start
Powell and Harden were averaging more than 20 points per game due to increased playing time with Kawhi Leonard injured
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings were struggling from three-point range, shooting just 3 of 26
Powell had scored 20 points or more for eight straight games
